title: Request an Extension of Time
description: An attorney needs to request a 14-day extension from opposing counsel to respond to a set of discovery requests.

tasks.description: Draft a professional email to the opposing counsel.
In the email, clearly state the deadline you need extended and the proposed new deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: The request is specific and unambiguous.

tasks.description: Briefly state the reason for the request (e.g., 'to allow for adequate time to gather the requested information from our client').
After receiving agreement, file a formal stipulation with the court if required by local rules.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows up to formalize the agreement.
